oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from consolidation interview with Charlie Howell, January 5, 1995
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an interview with Charlie Howell, conducted on January 5, 1995 by Carole Bucy as part of the Metro Consolidation Oral History Interviews. Howell discusses his role in the consolidation of the city and county governments. He also comments briefly on other individuals and their contributions. The complete record of the interview is available at the Metro Government Archives.
